/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjxtldxdr_temp t set error = error || '兑现金额超过提留标准或没有提留余额' where not exists (select 1 from KHFA_JXTL_HY jxtl inner join CSB_LRCS cs on cs.csmc='JXTLDXBZCS' and $sysdate$ between cs.QSRQ and cs.JSRQ inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=jxtl.khdxdh where hy.hydh = t.hydh and cast(t.dxje as integer)<= (jxtl.tjye - cs.csz)) and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjxtldxdr_temp t set error = error || '兑现日期不能小于重算限制日期'||(select cast(F_CHANGE_DAYS(20130421, cast(xtcs.csz as integer) * -1) as char(10)) from XTB_XTCS xtcs where xtcs.csmc = 'SYS_CSTS')||'！' where not exists (select 1 from XTB_XTCS xtcs where xtcs.csmc='SYS_CSTS' and F_CHANGE_DAYS(20130421,cast(xtcs.csz as integer)*-1) < cast(t.dxrq as integer)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
